원문: 그 건설적인 비판을 넘어서서 건설적인 대안이 나와야 한다.
MT: Au-delà des critiques constructives, nous devons proposer des alternatives constructives.
1차수정: Au-delà des critiques constructives, nous devons proposer des alternatives constructives.
최종번역문: Au-delà des critiques constructives, nous devons proposer des alternatives constructives.
